biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers for his rhythmic grace on the greens, is a celebrated figure in the Hector Trophée. A proud member of Hirsala Golf, Jarkko brings a unique blend of skill and charisma to the competition.

With eight past appearances, Jarkko's extensive experience is evident in his strategic play and composure under pressure. His dedication and talent have culminated in one coveted Hector Trophée victory and one Victor Trophy, solidifying his status as a formidable competitor.

As he prepares for his ninth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Jarkko remains a player to watch. His passion for the game and unwavering commitment make him a perennial contender for the championship.
